articles.title: Trump's jibes are wearing thin for many of Europe's leaders - BBC
articles.description: The ball is in the court of European leaders ahead of Thursday's emergency EU meeting in Brussels, writes Nick Beake.
articles.content:
Nick BeakeEurope correspondent, Brussels
Donald Trump delivered a wide-ranging speech at the Davos summit in Switzerland
"Without us, right now you'd all be speaking German," President Donald Trump… [+4611 chars]
